abstract: Users complained that a CBS Sports app cut out while they were trying to watch the big game.
snippet: Users complained that a CBS Sports app cut out while they were trying to watch the big game.
lead_paragraph: Watching the Super Bowl over the weekend turned out to be a not-so-superb experience for some owners of streaming devices like the Apple TV and Google’s Chromecast.

headline.main: For Some Cord Cutters, Streaming Super Bowl Was a Nonstarter
headline.print_headline: Tech Troubles Hurt Streaming of Super Bowl
